greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of multisets of k ternary words with a total of n letters.
comment: Ternary analog of A209406. Multiset transformation of A000244.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..141, flattened
Index entries for triangles generated by the Multiset Transformation
maple: b:= proc(n, i, p) option remember; `if`(p>n, 0, `if`(n=0, 1,
seq(seq(T(n, k), k=1..n), n=1..14);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Apr 13 2017
mathematica: b[n_, i_, p_] := b[n, i, p] = If[p > n, 0, If[n == 0, 1, If[Min[i, p] < 1, 0, Sum[b[n - i*j, i-1, p - j]*Binomial[3^i + j - 1, j], {j, 0, Min[n/i, p]}]]]];
Table[T[n, k], {n, 1, 14}, {k, 1, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 19 2018, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 27 2016
